faqs.question: What is SoDo?
faqs.answer: SoDo is a HRaaS, IT recruitment and resource augmentation platform that helps companies hire top 1% quality, multi-layer screened and vetted talent and resources for contract roles in 24 hours.

faqs.question: How fast can SoDo help us find talent?
faqs.answer: Speed is our strength. We work 70-80x faster than most of the recruitment and staffing companies out there. 99% of our clients receive a curated list of potential candidates within 24 hours of submitting their requirements.

faqs.question: What types of roles does SoDo help recruit for?
faqs.answer: We provide recruitment solutions for primarily for all  IT roles, including: Software Developers, Data analysts and scientists, QA, Project managers and more! </br> Non-IT: Business Development & Sales, Human Resources, Marketing, Designing, and Human Resources.

faqs.question: Does SoDo offer international recruitement services?
faqs.answer: Yes, SoDo provides global recruitment solutions, connecting you with top talent from around the world including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Japan, UAE and more.

faqs.question: How does SoDo ensure quality hires?
faqs.answer: Our rigorous screening process includes: </br> - Technical assessments to verify skills. </br> - Experience validation to ensure proven expertise. </br> - Cultural fit analysis to align candidates with your team. </br> - This multilayered approach ensures you only get top-tier talent.

faqs.question: What are the costs for your recruitement services?
faqs.answer: Our pricing is flexible and depends on your hiring needs. Contact us for a customized quote tailored to your requirements.

faqs.question: Does SoDo support short-term or contract roles?
faqs.answer: Yes, SoDo specializes in providing top quality talent for permanent recruitments, flexible staffing solutions, including short-term contracts, outsourcing freelance projects, and long-term hires based on your business needs.
